title: elo booster , buy account , smuff , RIOT FOR REAL ?
body: 1. HELLO GUY CAN I ASKING YOU SOME QUESTION , ARE YOU EVER GET MAD WHEN YOUR TEAM MATE PLAY SO BAD ( BOUGHT ACCOUNT ) WELL IM JUST SILVER 2 BUT IN THIS RANK I ALWAY MEET SMUFF FROM ENEMY TEAM AND MY TEAM MATE ALWAY HAVE ELO BOOSTER ( BOUGHT ACCOUNT ) AND AFTER EVERY GAME I JUST TRY TO REPORT THEM BUT THEY NEVER GET BAN FOR REAL RIOT ???? CAN YOU DO SOMETHING TO MAKE THIS GAME MORE FAIR PLEASE OMG .

replies.body: Nobody ELO boosts into fucking silver lmao.. That is like the reverse of boosting.

are you mad boosts is all the rank and silver is better than iron , i know alot people spend £40-£50 to get from iron 1 to silver 3 . So if you stuck in bronze 3 like 1 month so do you want to buy boosts if you want to get to silver ?
Can I ask why this is caps locked?
